inclusion.criterion: external beam radiotherapy of the bilateral inguinal nodal region
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: at least 25 fractions of 1.8-2Gy per fraction
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients not willing to participate (no informed consent)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer and has undergone external beam radiotherapy, meeting inclusion criteria. Exclusion criteria of re-irradiation and patients under the age of 18 are met.
